error.general.description: An unknown error has occurred while executing the plugin. Please consider informing the developer. Details:
error.general.title: Error
error.messages.incompatibleParentNode: The selected Rectangle has an unknown parent layer type. It can, therefore, not get replaced with text.
error.selection.description: Please include at least one text or rectangle node in your selection and try again.
error.selection.title: No text or rectangle selected
modal.lorem.description: Fills selected text element(s) with placeholder text.
modal.lorem.includeLineBreaks.label: Include line breaks
modal.lorem.terminate.label: End with punctuation mark:
modal.lorem.text.label: Placeholder text:
modal.lorem.trim.label: Trim text area height to fit inserted text
